articles.title: Little Amelia, seven, who melted hearts singing Frozen hit in a Kyiv bunker makes it to Poland - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amelia Anisovych, who is aged just seven, went viral last week when footage of her singing the instantly recognisable hit as dozens of people hid underground from Russian bombs was posted on Facebook.
articles.content:
A young girl who melted hearts singing the hit song 'Let It Go' from the Disney animated film Frozen to entertain a crowded bunker in Kyiv has made it safely out of Ukraine.
